content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the šiauliai district court the court has made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property between two parties referred to as the applicant and the defendant the applicant is entitled to several immovable properties while the defendant is also entitled to certain properties the court has granted the revised application and counterclaim with the applicant receiving a larger share of the property and the defendant receiving 100 shares of a legal person the court has divided the property with the defendant receiving a smaller share and the applicant compensating the defendant for the larger share the text discusses various articles in the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant has filed a lawsuit seeking the dissolution of their marriage and requesting certain marital property the court will determine the division of the property and may award compensation to either party the parties are also disputing issues related to fault in the marriage surnames nonpecuniary damages and the division of community property the marriage will be dissolved as both parties agree to it and the court will also resolve the division of the marital property the text refers to specific sections of the law and mentions the average market value of a registered name the court examines the evidence provided by both parties and concludes that some assets should be considered personal property while others should be divided equally the court takes into account the financial situation and needs of each party and awards the applicant a larger share of the property the court also decides on the division of land plots and dismisses the remaining claims made by both parties
